description.en:
The city of Tajimi, located in the southern part of Gifu Prefecture, Japan, is famous for Mino earthenware. The city is dotted with historical pottery producers and ceramic art museums. It has facilities where you can try your hand at making pottery, and many restaurants that serve food on Minoware dishes.

The story begins when Toyokawa Himeno moves to a shopping street in Tajimi. Many encounters await her, friends, town folk, ceramic art, etc. What will Himeno discover in a town famous for ceramic?

Description taken from MAL and the official manga site, see the upcoming [url=https://myanimelist.net/anime/42568/Yakunara_Mug_Cup_mo]Anime adaptation[/url] scheduled for Spring 2021.

(A revamped English version and an Indonesian version are currently being worked on by SSF Translations)
